summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 BMW 328I. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V071000 (AIR BAGS) EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR REPAIR. THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION IN JULY OF 2016. THE DEALER (BMW OF BEAUMONT, 1855, I-10, BEAUMONT, TX, 77701) STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE FOR THE REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE AVAILABLE FOR THE REPAIR AND TO CONTACT THE DEALER TO SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
